name: Neon Pong (itch) (Gabler)
description:
This is the classic pong, but with nice visual and sound effects.

Play against the AI or a friend!

Controls:
Player 1 - W and S
Player 2 - Up and Down arrows

Credits for the musics:
https://uppbeat.io/t/wake-yourself-up/future-bass (BF8VUDF1CKSTKWKR)
https://uppbeat.io/t/mountaineer/voyager (WMO6DZBC9JHYLYG3)
